name: Equestrian Portrait of Don Juan José of Austria
description: Equestrian Portrait of Don Juan José of Austria; José Ximénez Donoso (Spanish, about 1632 - 1690); about 1660 - 1680; Brown ink and brown wash over black chalk, heightened with white gouache, squared in black chalk (recto); Black chalk (verso); 23.2 × 21.3 cm (9 1/8 × 8 3/8 in.); 94.GA.93; J. Paul Getty Museum, Los Angeles, California
title: Equestrian Portrait of Don Juan José of Austria
medium: Brown ink and brown wash over black chalk, heightened with white gouache, squared in black chalk (recto); Black chalk (verso)
